characters: FB3E SERIES OF SHOTS FROM ABOVE AND BELOW WATER --FLASH
EXT. ACROSS FROM CAFE DE PARIS. DAY

dialogues.speaker: SMASH CUT
dialogues.text: MOTION -- flat out -- it's us -- we're running -- stumbli -- breathing rushed -- blood in the snow... We are JASON BOURNE and we're running down an alley... Supered below:   MOSCOW BLUE LIGHTS -- from the distance -- strobing through the night -- rushing toward us -- POLICE CARS -- three of the - SIRENS HOWLING as they bear down -- closer -- faster -- until they whip past the alley... Up against the wall -- BOURNE is hidden in the shadows. BOURNE is badly wounded -- shot through the shoulder -- bruises and broken bones from the final car chase in SUPREMACY... With a GROAN, he lifts himself up, staggers across a park toward a PHARMACY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROWS of MEDICINE and FIRST AID supplies, and in the background, a DOOR being jimmied...It's BOURNE...The ALAR goes off...

dialogues.speaker: MACRO ON
dialogues.text: VICODIN, as BOURNE grabs it...Then PENICILLIN... Then SURGICAL SUPPLIES: Scalpel...Forceps...Sutures...Cotton gauze...Betadine... BOURNE finds a large sink...Rests his gun there...Lays ou SURGICAL SUPPLIES...Checks out his back in the mirror...Opens the capsules of penicillin and pours the powder directly into the wound...Begins treating himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A POLICE CAR pulls up to the curb, lights flashing. One POLICEMAN goes to the jimmied DOOR. SECOND POLICEMAN sees blood and footprints. He motions to his partner to follow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE finishing up -- splashes water on his face -- he seems a man on a mission. He looks up -- A MIRROR. His face...

dialogues.speaker: FB1 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: "415" written on a building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to the program...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV Bourne walks down a corridor (corridor #1).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops approaching.

dialogues.speaker: FB1A FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Daniels leading Bourne down the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be saving American lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A black sack is thrown over Bourne's head, then: (STOCK) A torrent of quick shots of Bourne's kills: the Professor, Jarda, the blonde guy in Paris, Mr. And Mrs. Neski... And finally. BANG -- Marie hit in the head.      The car the bridge. She sinks away dead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The POLICE enter the back room, guns drawn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put your hands on your head and turn around slowly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE snaps out of it, doesn't move. POLICEMAN #1 (older approaches him. When BOURNE doesn't respond to his questions, the POLICEMAN starts forward. BOURNE turns and in one motion grabs his gun from the sink and disables th POLICEMAN. BOURNE freezes POLICEMAN #2 with his gun and a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian) Give me your gun and radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POLICEMAN #2's gun and radio skittle across the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in Russian)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My argument is not with you. BOURNE smashes the radio and takes the gun. BOURNE exits...

dialogues.speaker: BLACK SCREEN
dialogues.text: A TITLE fades in -- THE BOURNE ULTIMATUM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUPER:    Six Weeks Later

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishing shot -- CIA Headquarters

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A workman installs a nameplate that reads:    Ezra Kramer Director, CIA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kramer listens to a recording with Landy and Cronin. Ther are unhung pictures and a few other items that indicate h has just moved into this job. Two other senior CIA officials sit in on the meeting. Kramer looks at a file on Bourne and Abbott. BOURNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we got in the way?   Is that why Neski died? Is that why you killed Marie? Kramer glances at a photo of Marie in the file. ABBOTT (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You killed Marie the minute you climbed into her car.   The minute you entered her life she was dead! Kramer looks at Abbott's official photo. BOURNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you people to leave me alone! I fell off the grid. I was half way around the world. ABBOTT (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no place it won't catch up to you. It's how every story ends. It's what you are, Jason. A killer! You always will be.

dialogues.speaker: THUMP
dialogues.text: CRONIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We think that's Bourne hitting him on the head and then-- He makes a gun with his hand, i.e. Bourne putting his gun to Abbott's head. ABBOTT (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead!     Go on! Do it! BOURNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wouldn't want me to. That's the only reason your alive. The tape clicks off. KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's "she?" CRONIN puts a picture of MARIE in front of KRAMER. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His girlfriend, Marie. She was killed in India three weeks ago. Kramer looks down at another image.     Abbott dead after suicide. KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dirty section chief in league with a corrupt Russian Billionaire commits suicide when confronted by Jason Bourne. You couldn't make this stuff up. (holds up the photo of Abbot dead) You watched this happen? Landy nods.   Kramer shakes his head in disgust at the wh situation. KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne's last confirmed location is Moscow, three days ago? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what does he do now? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think he's looking for something he hasn't found. KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like what?     What's he after? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure. Maybe he hasn't gotten his memory back yet.  Not all of it. A look from Kramer... KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pam, what I need to know is, what kind of a threat is he to us? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he just wanted to hurt us he could have sent this tape to CNN. KRAMER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he still will. Maybe he gave it to you because he wants to throw you in the opposite direction of his real plan. I don't know. I just know my number one rule is "the only way to stay safe is to assume the worst."   As far as I'm concerned Bourne is a serious threat until proven otherwise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS interviews DANIELS, a TAPE RECORDER on the table between them. ROSS shows DANIELS some of the evidence he' assembled...WANTED POSTERS of JASON BOURNE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with poster) ...This one's three years ago -- had half of Interpol after him -- disappeared...Turned up in Naples -- Berlin -- Moscow -- disappeared again... (Daniels says nothing) The girl he was on he run with -- Marie Kreutz -- she turned up dead halfway around the world, from a sniper's bullet... (beat) What connects the dots? Is it Treadstone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turn off that tape recorder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The charm of old Paris captured in the workings of an elevator operating in a wrought-iron shaft... A WORK TABLE, covered with sheet music, music paper, pencils. And, sitting on the upright piano against the wall, a framed PHOTO of MARIE... A KNOCK on a door beautifully, heavily lacquered with centuries of paint... MARTIN KREUTZ, late 20s, opens the door and finds BOURNE. long look between them -- like two lost brothers who recognize each other -- each has been waiting for this moment for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Martin looks out the window. MARTIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is my sister? BOURNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's dead. She was killed. MARTIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it was going to end this way. It was always going to end this way... BOURNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't believe that. MARTIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did she die? BOURNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was shot. A man came for me. MARTIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then you killed him. Bourne nods. MARTIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now what? BOURNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone started all this...and I'm going to find them. Bourne looks at him for a beat and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne climbs the stairs. Bourne rounds a corner and stops, sees a bodyguard at a door up the street hail a car then go back inside. Bourne walks up to the door, the bodyguard comes out agai Bourne knocks him aside. Grabs the man behind him, ELLATRACHE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in French)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who started Treadstone? The bodyguard comes back, gun out--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in French, to bodyguard)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK! (in French, to Bourne)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're still looking for you. You are taking a big risk coming here. Bourne shoves him against the wall, hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in French)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just tell me what I want to know!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in French)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just provided them weapons.    I don't know who started--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in French)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know something.   Tell me where to start looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in French)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a journalist in London. Simon Ross. He seems to know a lot about you.   He has a source inside the program. Someone there from the beginning. What should I tell them if they contact me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in English)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They give me the name I want, or I burn their entire house down to get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS hurries to catch a TAXI as he talks on his cell phon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...This is big -- a skein of lies -- you pull at it and it just keeps coming -- I'll fill you in when I get home. And it's not finished, either. (beat) They're calling it `Blackbriar'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow this SEQUENCE as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LISTENING STATION in England scoops up MILLIONS of CELL PHONE CALLS...Sifts through BILLIONS of words...One word EMERGES from the CHATTER...

dialogues.speaker: BLACKBRIAR
dialogues.text: A TECHNICIAN sends the data to NSA back in the States...Where another COMPUTER gathers up the rest of th phone call...As we listen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Blackbriar" echelon hit. NSA, please confirm receipt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And there in the CRI HUB, another TECHNICIAN receives the DATA. Stops SUPERVISOR and reports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we intercepted a call from London, keyword "Blackbriar."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, send it to CRI right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOAH VOSEN, deft and confident, arrives at CRI Headquarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As VOSEN steps out of the elevator and into his office, h is met by his #2, WILLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We tracked the phone. Registered to a London reporter named Simon Ross. He works at the Guardian newspaper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter a hallway through double doors towards the HUB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tracking him? As they pass through, colleague hands WILLS a file.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, thanks Mike. We have a survey team covering him at work...and a sneak and peek's on their way to his apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, who talked to him? How did he find out about Blackbriar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't know, we pulled his background and ran a cross check on any known anomalies, but we've come up with nothing. But, I think if we follow Ross, we are going to be able...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. Ross is easy. I want the source. They enter the HUB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE buys a newspaper, enters the station and gets on t EUROSTAR. 26A   INT. DAY. CRI DATA ROOM (was 25E) VOSEN and WILLIS listen to the phone call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you heard of an Operation Blackbriar? I'm going to try and get my head around this, see you first thing. VOSEN turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that all?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want rendition protocols and I want the asset put on standby, just in case.

dialogues.speaker: INT. DAY
dialogues.text: VOSEN steps out from DATA ROOM...addresses the HUB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People, listen up, this is a full priority situation

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, give me Ross's profile on one. (points at the big screen on the wall)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS'S information come up on the center screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our target is a British national, Simon Ross, a reporter. I want all his phones, his blackberry, his apartment, his car, bank accounts, credit cards, travel patterns...I want to know what he's going to think before he does. Every dirty little secret he has. And most of all, we want the name and real time location of his source. This is NSA priority level 4, any questions?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No response from the HUB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, let's get to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EUROSTAR winds it's way to London.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE reads The Guardian. He sees an article written by Simon Ross.   Title: "RENEGADE ASSASSIN LOSE IN EUROPE". It mentions BOURNE. There is a photo of Marie--

dialogues.speaker: FB2 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Marie smiles at him. Marie shot. Marie fades into the depths, dead. Bourne burns Marie's stuff

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE comes out of the flashback.    He is still carryin the pain of her loss Bourne finds Ross's name on the masthead, then goes to th name just below it in the news department.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross crosses a busy London street -- heads to Guardian office building. A CRI TEAM watches from a parked car.

dialogues.speaker: INT. DAY
dialogues.text: TECH #1 watches the data arrive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy that. Mr. Vosen, subject is entering his office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN watches the feed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's my picture please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming online...Online...Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A surveillance picture flashes onscreen -- ROSS works in his office. HUB chatter about ROSS phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take an hour to get his phone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's too long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off VOSEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS reports to his EDITOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So how do we know he's not spinning for someone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's more. He was scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scared of what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blackbriar. A REPORTER sticks her head in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, a call for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Won't give hie name. ROSS leaves to pick up the call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS crosses the busy newsroom...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's on my line... ROSS picks up the phone. Ross (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Simon Ross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN watches as ROSS takes phone call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why aren't we hearing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a hard line, Jimmy, why don't we have it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have his line, sir, but he's not on it. WILLS looks confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS listens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waterloo Station, south entrance, thirty minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Jason Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: INT. DAY
dialogues.text: Bourne You want to talk to me. Come alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS looks bewildered -- hangs up the phone -- gathers hi stuff -- puts his notebook in his pocket and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you getting an image?

dialogues.speaker: 35H VOSEN
dialogues.text: Where's he going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, he is on the move.   Target is mobile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The HUB reacts. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, people, look sharp, give me eyeballs on the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SURVEY ONE has panned down to the entrance of the GUARDIA building. Because ROSS is on the move...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Subject is on the move. Go mobile One and Two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's that audio on the street? I want to know where he's going...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS hails a BLACK TAXI. The SILVER VAN pulls out behind him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN watches as the feed from the SILVER VAN comes through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over radio) We have the subject confirmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he heading?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waterloo Station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE arrives on the EUROSTAR.      Enters the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the taxi moves away, the SILVER VAN pulls out behind i A CYCLE COURIER momentarily blocks its path. Looking in o ROSS sifting through documents in the back seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand by at Waterloo...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE moving toward the rendezvous...

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. DAY. BLACK CAB
dialogues.text: ROSS pays the DRIVER, exits. Checks his watch.      Looks around. Isn't sure what his next move is--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TECHNICIANS searching for ROSS on the busy street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mobile One -- give us eyes on the subject.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOBILE ONE-- two people from the van-- take up a position in an open stairwell three floors up. They focus a camera down on Ross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE buys a cell phone. Activates the SIM card on the n phone. Dumps the pay-as-you-go package in a bin. Rounds a corner. Out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screens come alive with a POV of ROSS. VOSEN studies the monitors. ROSS arrives at Waterloo, pays TAXI.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, subject just arrived at the south entrance to Waterloo Station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS moves to the entrance. Behind him, inside the tube station portico, BOURNE arrives. Sees ROSS. Sees the two survey teams. MOBILE ONE up the stair well and MOBILE TWO at street level. Commuters coming up the escalators. BOURNE joins them - moving towards Ross. Closer. Right on him.   ROSS oblivious.   Looking out onto the street. BOURNE brushes past him and PUTS THE PHONE IN HIS POCKET. ROSS feels the contact. Checking himself -- he's okay. But now a phone is ringing -- looks around, must be someo else. But the vibration's coming from his jacket pocket. ROSS takes out the phone -- not his -- puzzled. ROSS hits "answer."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't ask questions. Just listen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN watching...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he doing? I thought we blocked his cell? Who the hell is he talking to???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, I need that phone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Activate the asset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we haven't yet become operational --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said activate the asset.   I want options. Wills keys in a CODE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ, 20s, cool and predatory, drives and waits for instructions...His PHONE buzzes...He reads the code...Accelerates toward Waterloo Station...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE reaches the top of the stairwell on the other side of the road. His POV to the left -- a LONDON BUS is approaching. To the right -- a young man in a hooded top -- speaking o his cell -- walking toward a BUS STOP... A plan is forming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SURVEY TWO -- camera zooming in on ROSS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the ROE on this one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN thinking it over as he watches the image of ROSS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS looking around.    Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To your left. Blue hooded top. Walking towards the bus stop ROSS has clocked him. The HOODY walks to the bus stop. One hands-free EARBUD swaying down by his side as he moves to a seat. Sitting down. Checking his watch. ROSS shifting nervously from one foot to another. BOURNE (o.s.) (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to the bus stop, sit next to him. Head down... The LONDON BUS approaching. ROSS begins to move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things are beginning to happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Target is on the move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, who's the guy in the blue hood? Screen POV. ROSS standing next to the HOODY -- head down. Trying to play it cool -- ROSS in clear view of the cameras. "Speaking" with the HOODY. Camera zooming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, there, he's talking to the guy with the hood. Take them down. Just then -- A BUS pulling up to the bus stop, blocking both SURVEYS' views. Rifle mics picking up the bus chatter, instead of ROSS. VOSEN.   Annoyed now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch that bus! The bus! -- don't lose them! Stay triangular and don't get blocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crackle of the survey teams as they try and reframe. POV SCREEN -- SURVEY ONE seeing the bus clear.   The HOOD has gone. POV ANOTHER SCREEN -- SURVEY TWO -- camera finally catchi up, picking out the HOODY on the bus as it begins to pull away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grab Team B. Grab the hoody and stay with Ross...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TECH'S giving orders...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SURVEY TWO -- three men racing across the road on foot. Weaving through heavy traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE watching his plan unfold...Only a few seconds to g ROSS out of there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the footbridge. Go to the West Entrance. I'll meet you at the newsstand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS rearing this -- Moving away -- The BUS moves up to the traffic light.   The AGENTS movin across the street...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN looking at the screens.   Pointing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, look...Ross is not on the bus.   Split up the team -- get the guy on the bus and send someone to stay on Ross.

dialogues.speaker: R81 EXT DAY. YORK ROAD
dialogues.text: One AGENT peeling off, to keep ROSS in check. The other two AGENTS racing to the bus as it pulls away from the lights. Kicking the doors open, leaping on. GUNS drawn.     So quick.   Passengers screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Hoody) You. On the floor. Down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pushing the HOODY to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Driver, stop the bus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the HOODY. The HOOD is pulled back. An innocent YOUNG MAN -- terrified, bewildered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS on the move across the walkway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SURVEY ONE moving up the steps, only to meet- BOURNE coming down. Three quick moves and he's down- slumped against a wall- just another drunk to step over i the rush hour. Pulls the feed. Takes the earbud. Then back up and falls into step behind ROSS. Listening in to the chaos he has caused -- an ocean away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TECHIES scrambling to restore the feed.     VOSEN staring

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've lost signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to Survey One?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like this. Patch me through to Met surveillance.

dialogues.speaker: INT/EXT. DAY. CAR
dialogues.text: PAZ parked up -- gets the call -- pulls out into the traffic. Slicing through to the target area. Waterloo up ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECOND SURVEY TEAM -- out of their vehicles.   Furtivel they lock and load their side arms. Fanning out towards the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne stops Ross, surprising him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you know so much about me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The article. You talked to someone from Treadstone. Someone there at the beginning.  What's his name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't tell you that.... Who's following me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoever they are it's trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are they Blackbriar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blackbriar, what's Blackbriar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I heard the name this morning for the first time. Whatever it is, my source said it started with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, just help me get away from these people...and we can talk more...we can--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (spotting approaching operatives)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to move. Bourne moves Ross toward the concourse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Answer your phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCREENS coming alive again. They are through to MET SURVEILLANCE -- the AREA around WATERLOO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last sighted heading to the West entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got to be close. Seal the entrances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The new SURVEY team moves towards different entrances -- Ready to beat out the quarry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERAS suddenly alive.   Movement across the footbridge. The net's been thrown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Into the station concourse. ROSS moving fast. Fighting through the crowds of faces. Each one a killer in ROSS' tormented mind. BOURNE on the periphery looking out across the throng, picking out the inconsistencies. One AGENT, then another approaching. He dials.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three o'clock. Female. Blonde black top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has she seen me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet. Dip left past the photo kiosk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS spinning round. Dipping left.   BLACK TOP passing in the background missing him. BOURNE crossing close behind - marshalling the pieces at breakneck speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Straight ahead. News kiosk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS turning.   Weaving through the commuters. BOURNE seeing cameras turn.    ROSS heading into their pa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Change of plan. Stop. Tie your shoelace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE seeing ROSS dip out of view as a group of TOURISTS block the CCTV's line of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That same scene -- scores of TOURISTS -- from VOSEN's poi of view. The TECHS try to get another angle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS looking through the sea of legs as he finishes tying his laces. Cameras sweeping past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we clear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clear. News kiosk. Straight ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS on the move. Sweating. Paranoid. Seeing a BIN MAN coming toward him -- reaching into his trolley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Straight toward me.     Bin man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got a gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative.    Keep straight ahead. But ROSS swerves out of his path as the BIN MAN pulls out a bunch of keys. CCTV CAMERAS turn -- ZOOMING IN ON ROSS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross' face on all screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got a hit. Middle of the concourse. VOSEN pacing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're losing him! We cannot afford to lose him! Frenzied teching as they capture and transmit an image of Ross to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ flipping open his phone. A voice crackling in his earpiece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waterloo concourse. Subject heading east. Paz jamming the wheel hard right. Doing a high speed U- turn. Heading towards the east side of the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE realizes ROSS has been seen. Sees the AGENTS starting to form the box...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get into cover. Now! ROSS moving faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 64H             What's the status of the asset?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In place in one minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, I want to take him now. Get him out of there and have the asset cover it. WILLS gives orders... 96    INT. CAR TRAVELLING-- MEPHAM STREET -- DAY. PAZ pulling into a side street. Out towards a series of arches that lead underneath the terminal. In his ear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Target moving towards the stores.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asset in play. ETA thirty seconds. All exits covered. PAZ through the archway. Grabbing a station plan. Studyin it. 98    Through a subterranean maze of corridors. Up steps. Through doors. On his way to the kill zone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS moving through crowds around the departures board. BOURNE hearing that last exchange in his earpiece too. Asset in play?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep moving... BOURNE's POV: AGENTS closing the box. The departures boar Platform 7. A train waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Faster.... Commuters waiting for the platform

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front... Suddenly -- CLICK -- PLATFORM 7 displays. A wave of commuters flooding away -- sweeping the AGENTS back with them towards platform 7.

dialogues.speaker: GET IN THE STORE.
dialogues.text: BOURNE'S bought them thirty seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ on the move. Earpiece crackling. Through a door. Taki a left down another tunnel. Opens another security door and moves up some steps. Towards a ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The AGENTS regrouping. Speaking into their radios. Voice

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in the store -- still moving east. ROSS out into the open again. In front of him another STO COMPLEX.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE
dialogues.text: BOURNE searching the concourse. Something bothering him. The threat level clicking another notch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ heads up some stairs to a service platform. Climbs a ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS into the store complex. To one side is a service doorway. BOURNE sees the AGENTS approaching. Looks the other way - up at the hoardings above. Something's not right. Treadstone instinct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Service doorway -- Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An image of Ross as he enters the store complex appears o the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Store.   Three means of egress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close him down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROSS through narrow store corridors. Sheer panic now. Two of the AGENTS move in after him. BOURNE behind them. BANG - takes the first out silently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep moving. ROSS moving out to the light as another AGENT follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the store room. ROSS travelling through.   The second AGENT right behind BOURNE steps out from behind the store room door. The dul snap of bones as second AGENT falls to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: INT. DAY
dialogues.text: On a screen VOSEN watches, transfixed, as BOURNE takes ou all his agents and then grabs ROBB...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ, that's Jason Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he's the source?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter, the asset now has 2 targets. Take them both out. WILLS taps in the order...

dialogues.speaker: INT. MAINTENANCE AREA-- DAY
dialogues.text: PAZ moves cross a narrow walkway. Now he's behind a mechanical 'tri-panel' hoarding. The ki that displays a different advert every 15 seconds. He wai for the change and then--- -- A huge field of vision across the concourse stretching out down below him- a sniper's heaven. PAZ pulling open the motor-casing from the side panel, go to work on it. Slowing the rotation. Rearranging the large triangular prisms to give him just the right time-gap to pull the trigger- and just enough cover to disappear. He takes out rifle parts from his rucksack. Starts to assemble them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to get you to safety but you have to stay calm do exactly what I say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fear-induced autopilot) Sure, okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, listen to me: Exactly what I say this time. Understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross snaps to focus.     Looks Bourne in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay here while I look for an escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ puts together the rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE exits from the silver door behind Threshers.    He stays on the phone with Ross. Hidden from the view of the CCTV cameras by the thick crowd, Bourne sees the approaching agents abruptly pullin back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can see the entrance from here I can make it out--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, stay behind that door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CCTV view of the silver door behind Threshers that ROSS i behind (not Bourne). Wills is on phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There. That silver door. Bourne's behind that door?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confirmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, pull the agents back and give Bourne's location to the asset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On his cell phone Paz receives a text indicating Bourne's location. Paz finds the silver door and aims his rifle at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shape barely visible moving behind the window. Ross but Paz and the Hub think it's Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: BETWEEN ROSS AND BOURNE
dialogues.text: Bourne spots the agents pulling back per Wills' orders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I run now I can make it--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.   Something's not right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paz awaiting his shot--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door comes open slightly, but from this angle Paz doesn't have a clean shot at his target (who he thinks is Bourne).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne searches the rafters, looking for any threats from above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to go for it, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move until I tell you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne is distracted by the last of the agents disappearing. Something is definitely wrong--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to go for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, No not now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross suddenly sprints out from behind the door--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paz sees the shape emerge--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ fires--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's Ross, not Bourne. Ross is hit by Paz's shot. falls, inches from the silver door, dead. Blood has splattered on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paz snaps his head back to the scope, realizing he's shot the wrong person. Then he catches a glimpse of Bourne-- Bourne ducks behind the gathering crowd, out of Paz's lin of sight, and goes to the body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and Wills stare at the screen. At the image of Ross dead on the concourse.   The room -- normally full of chatter has gone dead silent... Vosen puts his head in his hands. This is a monumental screw up and everyone here knows it.  He just had the wrong man killed....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh...shit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then suddenly Vosen snaps back to focus:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the asset out of there ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Bourne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the HUB MONITORS we see Police moving in... Vosen doesn't need to see anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get him out of there - NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne feels Ross' body for something.

dialogues.speaker: 110A PAZ'S NEST
dialogues.text: Paz is frustrated by the order. He's itching to get anoth shot off at Bourne, but after a beat, packs up quickly, a ordered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in Waterloo, Cops run in from all sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the screens and in real life, the aftermath of the hit PARAMEDICS try helplessly to deal with ROSS -- killed instantly by the head shot meant for BOURNE...POLICE arri and seal off the crime scene...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE on the move. Fast -- Past platforms. On his way up to the Tri Panel. Up stairs. On to a walkway.   To his right he sees a figu disappearing... PAZ. BOURNE hammers down the walk - way in pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE tailing PAZ down on to a parallel platform. PAZ dipping down into the underground entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAZ moving deliberately through the evening rush hour-- blending in... BOURNE in pursuit. Chasing on instinct. There...A glimpse of PAZ at the bottom of an escalator. BOURNE fights past people. PAZ disappears into the crowd. BOURNE rushes to catch him. Rounding a corner... A long walkway -- at the end, two staircases lead to different tube lines. BOURNE hesitates-- measures the choice. The sound of a train fills the station-- BOURNE -- Fast downstairs. Watches-- just as PAZ gets onto the car at another door. BOURNE lunges to get on the train...But the doors close..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watching PAZ from the platform as he SAGS down onto a sea nauseated, his skin clammy, his head pounding...He takes out the PILLS and dry-swallows them...Looks up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watching PAZ...As if he's looking in the MIRROR at his ol self...The self before THE BOURNE IDENTITY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks straight ahead, just another commuter...

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON
dialogues.text: Watching PAZ, as the train pulls away...Then BOURNE is immediately in motion...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Vosen. We have a situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishing Sewell and Marbury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DANIELS watches news of ROSS murder on TV. DANIELS panics opens his safe, packs up papers, takes Blackbriar FILE. Sets alarm. Leaves. 120C   EXT. NIGHT. INTERNET CAFE -- LONDON. BOURNE sits at a computer, the ROSS notebook open in fron of him. He pages through it, finding names, places, "HOW DID THIS ALL START?" -- and Blackbriar.   He Googles "Sewell and Marbury"-- finds Paris, Berlin, Madrid. BOURN continues to search and finds receipt from Madrid. BOURNE leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY steps out of a TAXI...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen's sitting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to waiter) Sparkling. And a "Heart-Healthy" omelet with goat cheese and peppers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy arrives. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're late. Traffic? WAITER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (handing her the menu) Ma'am? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing for me. Vosen looks at her, surprised. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm buying. She shakes her head, no. She sits, without taking her coa off. She's not staying long. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the Director called, it was suggested we bring you on-- LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suggested? (beat) Are you sure it was just a suggestion? VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny how different things look depending on where you sit. I look at this as doing a favor for you. Giving you an opportunity to complete some unfinished business. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meaning? VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason Bourne. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne's finished. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was finished the moment I realized I was chasing him for something he didn't do.   The case is closed. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what do you make of this? (handing her surveillance photos of Bourne in Paris) French intel picked up Bourne meeting Pierre Elattrache on Tuesday. He threatened to burn our house down if you didn't tell him who started Treadstone. That's a big problem, wouldn't you agree? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This doesn't feel like Bourne to me. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why's it so hard for you to believe? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probably because it's coming from you, Noah. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lets try and be adults okay? We all thought he was done, off the grid. But Bourne's back. Maybe he's a threat. We both want the same thing here. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what happened at Waterloo? VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a leak. Bourne showed up in our surveillance. We had very little time to react. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the reporter ended up dead? VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne saw us coming. Landy looks at him, suspicious. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what was he doing? VOSEN?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't know. But just the fact that he was there means he's up to something, don't you think? Maybe he's the source?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The real question is how you managed to get in a fire fight in the middle of a public train station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't second guess an operation from an armchair, Pam. It's not fair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to the office now. I'll make my own introductions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off VOSEN...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN AVE train pulling into the vast station. BOURNE steppi out, walking up the platform. Moving out through the station...

dialogues.speaker: INT. DAY
dialogues.text: TWO NEW TECHS plus the three we met before.       All wat VOSEN lead LANDY and CRONIN into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Pamela Landy. She's gonna be quarterbacking our search effort. I think what we oughta do, just to get started, let's go around the room, say who you are and what your spec is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY stepping in before this gets going --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do names later. (she's got the floor) What's Bourne's last fixed position? (impatient) Anybody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: London.   Twelve hundred Zulu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Status?   Wounded?   Armed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alive.    Mobile. Unknown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are your grids coming from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NSA Tactical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have an Echelon package?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why isn't it on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For what? (no takers) You're nine hours behind the toughest target you've ever tracked. I want everyone to sit down, strap in, and turn on all you've got. (beat) That would mean now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That lights it.    They're moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN watches...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want everything you've got on Ross on screen one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY watches as the screen lights up with ROSS information...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne arrives, begins to recon the area. He goes to the front door finds "Sewell and Marbury" and rings the bell. No answer. Two cops come around a corner. Bourne sees them, notes the side of the building and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we just hacked Ross's email account at the Guardian and found a round trip ticket to Turin, yesterday. 0800 arrival, 12:05 departure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we can be pretty certain that Bourne's not your source then?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ross's call to his editor, where he said he just met the source on Blackbriar, took place just after his flight landed. His met his source in Turin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, what, Bourne met Ross for breakfast and then, at noon the same day Bourne calls Ross to demand a meet at Waterloo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Needling Wills) Maybe they were even on the same flight?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cross check the secure cell phone usage of everyone with Blackbriar SCI clearance against all calls in and out of Turin during the morning Ross was there

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TECHNICIANS start pounding keyboards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guy you're after is a CIA operative with clearance above Top Secret.   He was committing treason by talking to Ross.   Do you really think, while doing that, he used a cell phone he knows we can track?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zero results on the cross check.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN stares daggers at her. WILLS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have a better idea? LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'd look at all the people whose cell phones were switched off the entire period Ross was in Turin. WILLS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it Jimmy. TECHNICIANS start tapping. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks at Cronin) I mean if your people use their cell phones as much as mine do, the list should be pretty small TECHNICIAN 3 JIMMY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three names: Tom Brewster, Jack Boulin, Neal Daniels. The names display on the screen:   Tom Brewster, Jack Bou Neal Daniels. The HUB employees can't help but be impressed by LANDY. WILLS and VOSEN notice their response. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now check everything in Ross's apartment against those names. Look for common patterns, look for - CRONIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Initials .....Bring that up on main. LANDY turns.   CRONIN is leaning down in front of a computer screen.   Point to something for the tech --- wh puts it on the big screen, blown up. In a set of handwritten notes by ROSS it says "per N.D."next to several scrawls. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neal Daniels.   He's Station Chief in Madrid now, isn't he? WILLS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call the RSO at the Embassy and have them take Daniels into custody if he's there.   If he's not, get a grab team to the Calle Norte safe house. Send them in heavy and tell them we'll assist with entry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Heavy?" Daniels isn't--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm worried about Bourne. If he's not Ross's source, then he must be after Ross's source -- just like us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off LANDY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE in a TAXI turning a corner into a narrow street. The rain has slowed, but the streets are still quiet. BOURNE gets out and walks past the SEWELL and MARBURY fro door, picks the lock and gains entry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE up the stairs.   Finds the office.    Jimmies the Disables the alarm. All the signs of a hurried exit. A half filled cup of coffee -- cigarette burned down in an ashtray but not snubbed out -- a light left on -- files and documents, so shredded, some not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen paces back and forth. The hub is MUCH quieter than it was in the Waterloo scenes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Parque Vasquez is clean. No sign of subject.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Team two, ETA Callee Norte?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BLACK CAR moving briskly through traffic and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAMMOND at the wheel.   KILEY with the map. Shutting off phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE checks the office.   Soon he finds a photo of Daniels with Albert Hirsch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne arrives at a nondescript steel door with two CCTV cameras covering it. He sees 415 written above the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flashback overwhelms Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV shots of Bourne walking down the long corridor with Daniels. Other shots revealing that Bourne is in Army dre greens (without hat). Daniels knocks and leads Bourne int

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne is driven to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne is dragged into a room with a large water tank. Hi hands have been bound behind his back, the sack's drawstring pulled tight, and he has been weighted down. Bourne is shoved into the water.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne falls into the water. SPLASH. He starts to sink. The wet sack allows us to see the outlines of his face. Also POVs as Bourne sinks.

dialogues.speaker: FB3E SERIES OF SHOTS FROM ABOVE AND BELOW WATER --FLASH
dialogues.text: Bourne struggles wildly at first. Tries to get out of his restraints. But to no avail. SRD men watch him from the edge of the tank. Perhaps also on monitors. Expressionless.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne fights every human instinct to draw a breath.    A shot from Bourne's POV:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to drown. There is nothing you can do to prevent this. Stop struggling and accept it. Finally Bourne can't hold his breath for an instant longe His mouth opens. Water rushes in. He convulses, begins to drown...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne's body goes limp.   SRD men watch.   No reaction.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne goes limp.   POV of him blacking out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE comes out of the FLASHBACK. As he staggers across the room, he notices a car arriving on the monitor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A car approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne snaps out of it and sees the car on a security monitor. 127C   EXT. STREET. Agents get out of car and approach building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, they're at the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN watches...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAMMOND AND KILEY enter the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE runs water into the TEA KETTLE -- sets the trap...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAMMOND and KILEY enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE listens from his hiding spot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY paces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, put it live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAMMOND moves quickly into the room -- gun raised. HAMMOND at the alarm box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarm's down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That has to be Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN already moving to the monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAMMOND and KILEY -- move cautiously from room to room -- they've done it before...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into mike) Safe's cleaned out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN pacing impatiently around the speakerphone --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit...    Track the passports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KILEY gestures to a light moving under a door. Kiley crouching...leaning in...hand on the knob, and -- Pulls the closet DOOR OPEN -- Nothing. Sink, dishes. a small kitchen.         And... on stove...a tea kettle and a spoon... Which is the last thing they'll remember, because... BOURNE -- coming around the corner fast -- full stop and BOURNE lays out HAMMOND... KILEY turns to find BOURNE -- who takes him out too. Then it stops. BOURNE yanks the headsets.       Closes the PHONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SCREENS go black.       Silence...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn it! Get a back-up team in there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TEA KETTLE payoff...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long till back-up arrives?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hub scrambles to answer that...       Landy paces in background. Suspicious of Vosen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long? (beat, loud, to the entire hub) Stop! Hang on. I have an idea...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON A SECURITY MONITOR -- BOURNE sees another figure movin up the stairs...Checking his watch, reloading his gun. Twisting into the path to shoot as the door opens, hesitating because- It's NICKY. A beat -- long unbroken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was posted here after Berlin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Daniels?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The office PHONE goes. Bourne waving her to it.   She pic it up. He hits the speaker phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Nicky Parsons. Who's this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy reacts to her voice... Both Vosen and Landy strongly suspect Bourne is there and listening... Vosen reads her "Duress Challenge" identity check off the screen. It reads: Challenge:    "Sparrow" Response if Under Duress:       "Ruby" Response if Normal:    "Everest" VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky, I need to do an ID challenge first. Code in: "Sparrow." Vosen looks at the screen to check her response... NICKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Response: "Everest". VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky, this is Noah Vosen. How long have you been on site? NICKY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just walked in. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have two officers on site. Are you in contact with them? NICKY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're down. Unconscious, but alive. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there any sign of Daniels? NICKY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky, this is Pam Landy. We have reason to believe there is a connection between Neal Daniels and Jason Bourne. NICKY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne, are you still looking for Bourne? I thought the case was closed. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, some people are convinced he's still a threat. I disagree but to find out I need to talk to him. VOSEN seething because LANDY has interrupted him... VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on Nicky. Vosen hits the mute button. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? You know Bourne's probably listening. Landy doesn't answer.    Vosen to Wills:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long till back up arrives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills holds up three fingers.      Vosen unmutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into microphone again) Listen, Nicky. I want you to stay put and secure the premises. It could be an hour until another team arrives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY piercing VOSEN with a look...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE continues to hold the gun in her face -- NICKY is very calm considering the predicament she is in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DIAL TONE as the line gets closed at the other end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They know you're here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long do I have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three minutes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASH: TWO SEDANS squeal around a corner.      CRI reinforcements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 minutes to safehouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My car's outside.    I know where Daniels is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE lowers his gun, grabs the phone and dials "1-1-2"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emergency operator. Where is your emergency?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE answers her in perfect Spanish with a perfect Madr accent, but worked up, like a civilian would be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 334 Calle Norte. I hear gunfire. And men shouting. I think they're Americans --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE pushes the phone off the desk -- fires four shots into the ceiling -- calmly moves Nicky towards the back door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You "disagree" he's a threat? He just took out two more of my men. Not to mention his ultimatum to Ellatrache?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only way this has a happy ending, Noah, is if we find a way to bring Bourne in voluntarily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants revenge, Pam. The only realistic way to deal with this is to eliminate the threat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE and NICKY rapidly descend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, where is Daniels headed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 o'clock this morning, he wired $100,000. to a numbered bank account in Tangier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Tangier is about 300 miles away, we can make the morning ferry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then what?

dialogues.speaker: EXT. NIGHT
dialogues.text: Bourne and Nicky exit on to the street.     Suddenly they tires squealing nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue to walk down the street towards Nicky's car

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and Landy are watching this live. As they cross the street two MADRID POLICE CARS come arou the corner the wrong way and screech to a stop. Vosen reacts...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four cops jump out and take aim at the AGENTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manos Arriba! Manos Arriba!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More sirens closing in.      A third police car appears. Then a fourth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen can't believe it--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The agents drop their guns and surrender. BOURNE and NICKY continue around a corner -- they get in her VW GOLF and drive away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen stares at Landy.    A beat, then she walks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Issue a standing kill order on Jason Bourne, effective immediately.

dialogues.speaker: INT. NIGHT
dialogues.text: VOSEN on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lost Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still think he's after Daniels?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Nicky's just the means. But if we find Daniels, we'll find Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniels knows way too much. Daniels knows everything. We can't let them meet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take care of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And fill Hirsch in.     Just in case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE and NICKY sit over coffee.    A long silence...the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you after, Jason?   Why are you looking for Daniels?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know who this is? Bourne puts the photo of Daniels and Hirsch on the table between them.    She looks at the photo, points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Daniels. (points at Hirsch)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know who that is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to get back to the beginning...or I'll never be free of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think he started Treadstone.    I remember meeting him.   I remember the first day... (beat) Daniels brought me to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky looks back at him....not sure what to say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An initiation...I guess...

dialogues.speaker: FB3B FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: QUICK FLASH: Bourne, head in sack, is held underwater, struggling desperately for breath--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne comes out of the flashback.      Nicky is looking him....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason...that wasn't some one-off initiation. Daniels said they did that to you over and over again.   That's how they...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She doesn't finish.    And Bourne doesn't ask her to. a long pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you helping me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was difficult for me...with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE looks up.    Another long pause...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really don't remember anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY'S face. Two SPANISH COPS enter the cafe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They get up and leave...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen goes to his safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to voiceprint mic) Noah Vosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then he puts his thumb into a print reader. The safe door pops open. He pulls out a file marked "Top Secret."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRONIN makes his way down the hallway. LANDY works at her desk.       CRONIN enters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They tracked Daniels' passport to a hotel in Tangier. They're holding up a bank transfer he made to keep him in place while they move an asset in from Casablanca.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off LANDY.    This just keeps getting worse...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy enters without knocking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when do you have authorization for lethal action against Daniels?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since he cleaned out a Blackbriar safe and fled to Morocco!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So grab him--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have the people on the ground to do that and I'm not going to risk that file falling into the wrong hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?    What's Daniels got?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he got? He ran all of Blackbriar's operations in Southern Europe and North Africa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think the world's well aware we have a rendition and lethal action capability at this point, Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For Christ's sake, Pam, he's got our entire playbook. Names, dates, ghost sites, how we train our assets.....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still don't have the authority to kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yes I do, Pam. Vosen holds up the file we saw him pull out of his safe. It is labeled "Blackbriar: Lethal Action Protocol."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what makes us special. No red tape. No more getting badguys in our sights and then watching them escape while we wait for some bureaucrat to issue the order. Landy opens up the file. Sees the words "instantaneous lethal action is authorized when..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just decide? No oversight. No checks and balances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Pam, you've seen the raw intel. You know how real the threat is.    We can't afford to have our hands tied like that anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE and NICKY ride the ferry from Gibraltar to Morocco...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They arrive and pass through CUSTOMS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DANIELS drives...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH arrives, grabs a TAXI...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE and NICKY enter a shabby room. Turn on the fluorescent lights... BOURNE tosses his BACKPACK on the bed... NICKY plugs her LAPTOP into the USB port... ON THE SCREEN, as NICKY hacks into the system... BLACKBRIAR...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Pamela Landy for him. Would you tell him it's urgent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone buzzes.   Kramer picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Pam Landy. She says it's urgent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Kramer...the wheels turning....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell her I'm unreachable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kramer hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy receives the news.... The wheels turning in her head.... She hangs up.    A pensive moment, then she gets up and heads for--

dialogues.speaker: INT. DAY
dialogues.text: LANDY AND CRONIN enter the hub-- VOSEN is in the middle of giving the kill order.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me the subject's location.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Subject is currently on foot and now entering Hotel Velazquez. 45 Route Commerce, Tangier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get an elevation and a floor plan, tic-tac-toe. Locate the room. Give the asset Daniels's location and the route between Daniel's hotel and the bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH looks down at his beeping cellphone.      It has a M the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky at her computer. SHE LOGS IN WITH HER USER I.D. Bourne looks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and Wills.    Landy still pacing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have that room yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes sir Room 117.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the hotel's trunk line. Run all calls through here with an iso on 117

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the asset is acquiring the materials.

dialogues.speaker: INT. LOCK-UP GARAGE. DAY
dialogues.text: DESH opens a lock-up and goes in. He comes out with a scooter and drives off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky types on computer.    Enters search parameter: NEAL DANIELS. ACCESS DENIED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His location's being blocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now they found Daniels, do you know where he is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll get one of the operatives to terminate him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find out who.

dialogues.speaker: INT. LOCK-UP GARAGE. DAY
dialogues.text: Desh works on a bomb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Desh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH BOUKSANI's profile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him you're going to meet him and that you have a new phone for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you stop Desh they'll just get someone else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not going to stop him. We're going to follow him. He'll take us right to Daniels.

dialogues.speaker: INFORMATION FROM NICKY.
dialogues.text: "Meet me Tangier Cafe Paris" The bomb is finished on the Work table.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. LOCK-UP GARAGE. DAY
dialogues.text: Desh takes the scooter out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne and Nicky walk. Desh rides his scooter. TIGHT ON COMPUTER SCREEN: DESH'S ICON TURNS OFF COURSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the asset is deviating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find out why.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. ACROSS FROM CAFE DE PARIS. DAY
dialogues.text: BOURNE, recalculating. Looking around him. A scooter is pulling up and the driver walks toward BOURN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asset unscheduled stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY SITS, Desh walks up and snatches the phone off of t table. A scooter is pulling up and the driver walks toward BOURN He brushes past him, taking the key. Keeping DESH in sight as he returns to his Vespa and pull out in to traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the asset is on the move, in route to subject.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the asset is back on course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we have an unauthorized breach. Someone with active system knowledge has penetrated out protocols. Information was passed to the asset at 14.11. (beat) The trace is confirmed and valid. It comes from a computer belonging to Nicky Parsons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN looks over at Landy....his wheels turning.   A seri of cuts between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did the course deviation occur?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: South to Rue Belgique. Stationery at Place de France.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's where Parson's is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pauses, deciding what course to take.    Landy watches VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we're finished with Daniels send the asset after her. We find Parsons, we find Bourne. LANDY (OVERLAPPING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (going to Vosen, firm) Noah, what are you doing? VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now.   I want to know what's going on. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm asking on what basis you're continuing this operation. VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the basis that Nicky Parsons has compromised a covert operation. She is up to her neck in it. LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is about Daniels, not Nicky! VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has betrayed us! LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know the circumstances! VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's in league with Jason Bourne for Chrissake! LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have the authority to kill her or Bourne! VOSEN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I do Pam, it's right here and it's legal. VOSEN slams a document on the desk.   INSERT SHOT: "Blackbriar: Lethal Action Protocol." LANDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's one of our own.   You start down this path...where does it end?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ends when we've won.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY turns and storms out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Notify the asset of the additional target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BRYAN codes in a kill order on NICKY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he rides his VESPA, DESH receives additional target information..Pictures of BOURNE and NICKY. DESH glances in his rearview mirror -- spots BOURNE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have the bank release the funds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TECH calls DANIELS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DANIELS answers phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Daniels, Bank of Tangier. Your funds are now available.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daniels leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH parks the motorbike and walks around the corner, BOURNE follows. DANIELS' car coming down the street.     BOURNE stops and the car -- realizes the danger. BOURNE turns back to see DESH with the detonator in his hand. BOURNE locks eyes with DESH.      Before BOURNE can react DESH detonates. BOOM! DANIELS is DEAD. BOURNE is thrown across the street by the blast.     He l MOTIONLESS. DESH POV. He looks back to see BOURNE not moving, lying i the street. DESH gets on his motorbike and heads off to kill NICKY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY still at that cafГ© waiting. Taking out her phone- puzzled. She answers. Looking around. NICKY                                     *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Code in?                                            * (no reply)                                      * Code in?                                            * Nothing. Just the noise of traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH on the move towards Petit Socco. On the cell - makin that 'silent call'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE'S too late- hearing the 'line busy' tone. Knows th tactic. And those POLICEMEN are getting closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frenzied teching. A screen comes alive. TECHY                                     *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a trace.                                    * TECHY 2                                   *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
