dialogues.text: Target heading north. Rue des                       * Chretiens. Intercept ETA six                        * minutes.                                            * VOSEN                                     *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, that's it.    Bar her cell.                   * Tie it off.                                         *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH is disappearing from view. And the POLICEMEN are surrounding BOURNE. Demanding to se his papers. BOURNE speaking in Spanish - fishing for his papers. Looking back up the street. Forming a plan. Checking his watch. More POLICE arriving now. And DESH has disappeared out of sight. No time for this. BOURNE breaks away. Through the crowds into the traffic. Police whistles- shouting. Confusion. The chase is on. Three policemen turning into his path. No choice. BOURNE taking them down. Sprinting out across the road. A KID and his moped. Caught up in the police dragnet. BOURNE leaping on the bike - kick-starting it. Away into traffic as two squad cars turn and make chase. BOURNE weaving through traffic. One hand on the bike the other on the cell, desperately trying to call NICKY. But now, at least he's got a dial tone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY grabbing the cell. Answering. NICKY                                 *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne?                                           * BOURNE                                *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky?    Listen to me.   You need                * to -                                              * The line goes dead. Looking at the screen - 'SERVICE

dialogues.speaker: DENIED'
dialogues.text: Really spooked now- looking around. Time to move. Dismantling the phone instinctively - scattering it's components. She starts to make her way out of the square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH through the streets-getting closer - heading towards the PETIT SOCCO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE picking up the pace. Three more police cars out of side road just missing him. BOURNE choosing his exit. Up ahead- a narrow alleyway - taking it. The squad cars crunching to a halt, behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH crossing the SQUARE weaving through a sea of push bikes. Parking his Vespa at the corner of RUE DES CHRETIENS. Travelling on foot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY - trying to keep calm. Checking each alley. Moving on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE arriving - seeing NICKY has left. Seeing DESH'S Vespa parked up. More police - on foot now. BOURNE parking up. Seeing the crowded streets. Looking up to the rooftops. He needs to get higher. Starts running up steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE into a riad. Through a courtyard - up more stairs up a ladder. Out onto the rooftops. Scanning the skyline. A beat. Has he misjudged? No, there in the distance at the top of a narrow street- NICKY walking slowly and behind DESH. Moving quickly. BOURNE tailing him - trying to close the gap. Dipping dow through another riad - through an alley. Up more stairs. Back up onto another roof. He's gained a few metres on DESH. Desh goes up to the rooftops now. Bourne has him in sight DESH is prepping his gun with a silencer. DESH speeding up. BOURNE sees NICKY down below amongst th crowds. In Desh's sights. BOURNE knows he has to gain more ground. CABLE CAM shot - Two trained assassins leaping across the narrow streets - silently effortlessly -- the cops down below searching the alleyways, oblivious to the chase unfolding above them. BOURNE nearly on terms with him - then -- DESH dipping down again into the street below.       Avoi the police -- he melts into the crowds. STEADYCAM SHOT - following BOURNE as he heads downstairs. More stairs. Through a corridor then a courtyard - bursting out of a door into the street - A police checkpoint. Right in his path.     Bourne forced dog leg and take another route. BOURNE'S lost him- for the moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY - walking fast up the Rue des Chretiens.       Wond why there are so many police around. Suddenly stopping - seeing DESH - knows instantly that he is coming for her. Now we see NICKY'S skills.    Has to think on her fee t-

dialogues.speaker: TREADSTONE MINDSET --
dialogues.text: Checking the alleyways.     Slipping out of sight. NICKY looking to the rooftops -- taking the advantage. some steps -- into a riad. Desh tracking her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE seeing Desh again - further up the street.      He in that direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY through one hallway - then another.    Moving up al the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DESH arriving at the steps. Looks up to where Nicky is going. Takes the entrance to the next building. Anticipates her next move. Aiming to cut her off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY up steps.    Out onto the rooftops.   Looking for a across them. Scrabbling across the roof of this crumbling riad.    Kno she can't go back down. She makes it across to the next building. Where Desh is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE up high.    Seeing NICKY on that other roof. He can't get across to her.    Moving fast now. Down steps.   Into the riad courtyard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE entering the hallway. Moving up the stairs.   Towards Nicky. And towards Desh. Meanwhile NICKY moving down. Looking out into the courtyard below. The sound of POLICE getting nearer. BOURNE hearing the POLICE too as he moves up onto a landing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE into a main room - something stirring on a couch - girl and her little sister having a siesta. In another room two small boys fast asleep.    TV playing One wakes. A noise on the stairs above. Quickly arranging a mirror - getting line of sight - Bourne dipping into a corner. It's NICKY. She gives him a look -- DESH is in here somewhere. The door goes below them.   The noise of Police entering Riad. NICKY signalling to BOURNE - this way. They climb narrow stairs to the next floor. Down below Police begin searching rooms. Waking the sleeping family. Shouting, crying. Commotion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE and NICKY creeping up the steps. Then - suddenly NICKY spinning round as two silenced bullets speed past her - And DESH bursting out of a landi toilet. On to Bourne. Full on Treadstone fighting in the narrow stairwell. Crashing into a tiny disused lift cage- silent constraine vicious. Downstairs a young POLICEMAN hears the noise- heading for the lift. NICKY seeing the handle turn. Thinking quickly.   She sen the lift up to the next floor. The POLICEMAN stepping back from the door -- directing th other cops out to the courtyard. People are spilling out into the atrium.   It's pandemoni

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne and Desh spill out of the elevator and onto the roof. BOURNE kicking the gun - spinning across the floor - he a DESH facing each other. DESH with BOURNE - straight over the edge. DESH still on top - just. A brutal exchange. Matching each other's moves like shadows. Relentless. Rolling - falling onto another roof level. And another. The two men tiring now. DESH grabbing for the bag.     Th pills. BOURNE kicking them away. BOURNE has the upper hand now.      DESH'S reaction's slo No longer the match he was. BOURNE drags him to the ground.     He's finished.   Bour won. DESH- shivering -- convulsing. In the struggle, BOURNE strangles Desh. 194    BOURNE and NICKY hide DESH's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, we need to be dead.    You need to code that in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NICKY CODES into DESH'S PDA -- BOTH OBJECTIVES ACHIEVED...In the CRI HUB the message comes up...VOSEN an LANDY believe NICKY and BOURNE are both DEAD...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The code from DESH remains on screen -- BOTH OBJECTIVES ACHIEVED -- like an EPITAPH for BOURNE and NICKY...VOSEN packs his briefcase. Turns to WILLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to be sure. Have the station chief in Rabat confirm the deaths and do a sub-rosa check...And keep and eye on Landy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off WILLS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cronin enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hub just got word Bourne and Nicky are dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confirmed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy looks away...thinking.      Wheels turning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get me a copy of Bourne's personnel file.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne and Nicky enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE scrubs the blood from his hands.    REVEAL Nicky watching him from the bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy sits at her desk reviewing files on Treadstone. Ope on her desk we see the file she will be looking at in the Supremacy phone call. The way she examines the papers we get the sense she thin something is missing, some piece, some file.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne scrubbing the blood from his hands. Nicky comes in touches his shoulder. There's a tenderness to it, a re- assurance. For a moment it looks like Bourne might react...but the moment passes....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy opens a new file.   Bourne's operations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne is toweling off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can see all their faces. But I can't remember any names....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy looks at Bourne's kills. The faces Bourne remembers But there names are here, and who they were, why they wer killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne and Nicky sitting together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was starting to remember who they were...in India...with Marie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just going to lead to more killing, Jason. Are you sure you want that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne takes her words in.    But who he is is eating him alive from the inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've killed people and I've tried to apologize for what I've done, for what I am. None of it makes it better...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another moment passes between them...then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're going to come for you again. You are going to have to run now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky dies her hair BLACK.    Starts cutting it shorter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne walks with a now dark-haired Nicky. They exchange looks for a long beat. She turns towards the bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It gets easier.

dialogues.speaker: INT. LANDY'S OFFICE. NIGHT
dialogues.text: Landy finds a denotation in Bourne's file that he was "recruited to Treadstone by Neal Daniels."   Further down the   page it says "Bourne was inducted into Treadstone a the Special Research Department facility at 415 E 71st, New York, NY."    Then "Facility closed by order of Director, June 2002."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne looks at the tattered remains of Daniels' body and belongings. He goes through his briefcase and finds a nearly destroye piece of paper with "Noah Vosen - Director of Operations CRI" written on it. Bourne slips the morgue attendant a bribe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen is shaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Station chief in Rabat just called, they found a body. Bourne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Desh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On final approach to JFK. Bourne looks out the window to see the Verizano Narrows bridge.   And beyond it, Manhattan.   Bourne is coming home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishes skyline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pam, You need to see this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy follows CRONIN into--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE'S PASSPORT is displayed on the computer monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This passport just cleared Immigration at JFK ten minutes ago. It's an early Treadstone identity registered to Jason Bourne but he never used it and it never went to the grid. Bourne's alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, if they knew Vosen wouldn't be in his office right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne moves through the airport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a hell of a risk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Maybe Bourne wants us to know, just like Naples, maybe he's communicating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he's trying to communicate with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we should communicate back. Because I think I know what Bourne's looking for.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: Bourne over the 59th Street Bridge -- arrives at CRI -- goes into the adjacent building --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne uses his monocular to zoom in on a file Vosen is looking at -- he sees the word "Blackbriar." Vosen puts the file back in the safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY'S cell phone rings.   She answers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pamela Landy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hear you're still looking for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY puts down her pencil.   CRONIN watches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His phone rings.    He picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in here! Bourne called Landy! Vosen jumps up, sprints toward the hub--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I owe you an apology.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen rushes in--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that official?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we triangulating?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Off the record. You know how it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trying--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good-bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait.     Wait. She opens a file on her desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne listening--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David Webb. That's your real name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the hell did she give him that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were born 4/15/71 in Nixa, Missouri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you come in, and we'll talk about it? (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get some rest, Pam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look tired. Vosen realizes--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rushing out)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got line of sight on us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spins to look for Bourne--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen moving across the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...This is a national security emergency. We have an imminent threat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy takes out her gun.   Checks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jason Bourne is alive and at large in New York City. We believe in one thousand yards of this building. I want an immediate twelve block lockdown of the area. Send a FLASH message to Langley, prep for local backup assistance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HIGH ANGLE:   Landy leaves CRI.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills walks over to Vosen. The look in his eye indicates that he thinks there's something odd about this:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy just left the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen looks at Wills.... A beat, Vosen's suspicion building, though he can't quite put his finger on what he suspects...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check Landy's phone.   Is she using it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy receives a text message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen leans in to the Hub's back monitoring room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing?   No calls since Bourne-- ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. Wait. She just got a text.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy heads for someplace -- now with purpose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN confers with WILLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell do you mean we can't read it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Working on it--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frustrated) How do you know a text came if you can't read it-- (to Wills) Are we on Landy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six men.   More on the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want that goddamn text.   We need to get out in front of her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seconds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN paces anxiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TECH points at big screen: "Tudor City Pl & 42nd.   T minutes. Come alone. Come on foot."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surround it. Anyone not on Landy goes to Tudor City. Now! (to Wills) Get the trucks. We're going mobile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY walks east toward Tudor City.   She looks around he for any signs of surveillance but finds nothing out of th ordinary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and AGENTS come running out of the front door. Others leave through a side entrance.   They jump in sedans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy still being trailed by foot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and agents race to Tudor city.   An electronic map the dash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy, we're going to take a left at 41st. One block, settle at the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the map up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a bad place to pick, it's too exposed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wouldn't have chosen it if he didn't have a reason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY walks east through the crowded streets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE walks down the street, enters a building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spotter on a rooftop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDY is on the east side now, walking toward Tudor City. An agents trails her on foot.   Another parallels her fro across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERIES OF SHOTS: CRI cars arrive, careful to stay several blocks from the meet site. They jump out and try to set u surreptitious surveillance posts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay folks here we go, box at two hundred meters. Let's lock it down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne climbs stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy walks, agents are everywhere looking for her.   Vos is still in car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As soon as you have eyes on Landy, I want to know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She becomes clear to AGENT 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, here we go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne climbs stairs.   Walks down a dank hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy that, I see her. Landy stands on a corner waiting for Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any sign of Bourne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT SHOT on Bourne's face. FAST TILT to TIGHT ON his hands, pulling up what seems like a piece of clear tape. We can't tell where we are or what he's doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON Bourne's hands placing the clear tape on a piece of clear plastic. Again we can't tell what's going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents watch Landy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen's cell phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah Vosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Jason Bourne. VOSEN reels for a beat. Then quickly scans the streets, trying to see if he can spot BOURNE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you get this number?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't actually think I was coming to Tudor City, did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I guess not. But if it's me you want to talk to maybe we can arrange a meet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you right now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In my office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I doubt that. If you were in your office--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL that BOURNE is inside VOSEN'S office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd be having this conversation face-to-face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE hangs up. Puts a portable dictaphone up to VOSEN'S SAFE and his play:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noah Vosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he places the plastic slide we saw in the ECUs into th fingerprint reader. The safe pops open--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN stunned....     Is it possible?   Is it a trick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the safe, BOURNE scoops out the "TREADSTONE: Blackbriar" folder Bourne saw Vosen putting into his safe He flips it open. He scans down the page.         His eye stopping at the words "US Citizen." He flips to another page -- another photo, and again "US Citizen." BOURNE shoves the folders in his backpack and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a code ten abort, I want everybody back in the vehicles this is a code ten abort! Back to the vehicles immediately, back to CRI immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne rushes down with his back pack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills grabs the phone and hits a speed-dial:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne got into your safe!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne onto the street with back pack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SERIES OF SHOTS -- VOSEN'S SUV races, lights and sirens, across town. 2) Other CRI cars race back across town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE walks out of a building, backpack over his shoulde CAMERA BEGINS TO CRANE UP... BOURNE walks around a corner near CRI. He hears a siren turn on a few blocks away. Then another.   He starts to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SEDAN pulls to a stop as a door comes open. CRONIN'S inside.   REVEAL Landy on the sidewalk. She jumps in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What just happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne got into Vosen's safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! Cronin pulls out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 415 East 71st Street. Cronin puts it together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4.15.71...     Jesus, Pam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE walking away from CRI. Agents leaving a building.    Getting into unmarked sedan and peeling out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Vosen races across town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I want the entire building searched. Every room. Every hallway. Every closet. Every goddamm airduct. Do you understand? I want him found!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passenger side agent sees BOURNE, points-- BOURNE cuts to the south side of the road so the passenge side agent doesn't have a shot, while controlling the car makes it almost impossible for the driver to fire accurately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The westbound car cuts sharply and drives up on the sidewalk. But Bourne is too fast. He's already past them. The passenger side agent jumps out. But he's still got to get around the door and then move a few steps to get a be over the hood of his car on Bourne. The other CRI car races the wrong way on the street but gets immobilized and trapped by the onrushing tunnel traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and Wills race West on 41st.

dialogues.speaker: 242B SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: CRI cars close in -- on 42nd, on 39th, on 10th Ave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne races through the tunnel traffic and onto 40th street.   He rushes east toward the spaghetti of concrete ramps leading into and out of Port Authority. He runs across 10th Avenue as a third CRI car screams up the street at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several radios blare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's heading for Port Authority! Subject up the ramp, eastbound into Port Authority.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Tac Team Leader)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lethal force is authorized.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell them again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne runs up a one lane outgoing ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver pilots his car up the ramp behind Bourne. He jams the accelerator down.   He'll be on top of Bourne -- running him over -- in seconds--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A New Jersey-bound bus exits the complex and heads around the corner of the ramp -- it skids to a stop when it sees Bourne and the CRI car giving chase heading right at the bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver has to skid to a stop to avoid hitting the bus Bourne slides between the side of the bus and concrete guard rail.   The driver calls it in--

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: Cops and CRI cars close in on Port Authority.   One agent jumps out of his car on 8th Avenue and rushes for the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Block every exit. I want a full perimeter on Port Authority--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne races up a set of stairs the rooftop parking lot. He surveys every aspect of his environment on the fly (which includes his taking a quick peak over the concrete railing at the east end of the roof. Next Bourne rushes toward the parked cars. Smashes the window of one to set off its alarm.   Then a second and a third, setting off their alarms. The fourth window Bourne smashes in doesn't set off an alarm. Bourne pulls the door open and climbs in. Inside the car Bourne reaches under the dash and yanks handful of wires off the steering column and starts to expertly hotwire the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Box him in! Box him in!

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: Agents race up stairwells.   Two CRI cars careen up the ramp to the passenger parking (a separate ramp to the bus ramp we saw Bourne on earlier.) A third CRI car races through the parking level just below the roof and up the circular ramp to the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Vosen)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's on the roof.   He's trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne works to hotwire the car. A CRI car gets to the roof.   Two agents come from the elevator lobby.   The three car alarms distract them. The search for Bourne, but can't find him at first... Bourne gets the car engine on - but, given the wonders of modern anti-theft technology his steering wheel is still locked. A second CRI car arrives. Bourne slams the car into low gear and backs up at high speed. He smashes into the car across the aisle from him. With a sharp metallic snap the wheel in Bourne's car is suddenly free, he jams the car into drive pulls out into lane and stops. Three CRI cars here now. Two head straight for him.   A third blocks the exit ramp. Bourne checks the rearview and sees two more agents pour from the elevator lobby, one carrying the serious firepow of an M-4 (an M-16 variant whose bullets can penetrate metal and concrete). They move into position to get a bea on him. Bourne assesses. But he doesn't move. The agents swarm toward him. What the hell is he doing? Why is he waiting?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got him! He's got nowhere to run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take him out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The agents clear their obstructions and drop their barrel toward Bourne-- But before they can get a bead-- Bourne slams the car into reverse again.   Petal to the metal in reverse-- The agents open fire. Bourne ducks the lead slugs ripping through the windshiel But there's no dodging the shower of broken glass. As Bourne disappears below the dashboard, the CRI agent adjusts his fire into the car's grill. Virtually blind, Bourne races the hard-pressed vehicle backwards as the agent's fire decimates the car's driveline. Bourne slips the car into neutral and takes a quick peek behind him. Steers still speeding but quickly dying car towards a sma gap between two parked cars at the edge of the parking structure. Bourne's car splits the gap between the parked cars, hits the base of a low angled wall that slams the back of his car up and over the wall. Bourne is pounded as his car jounces onto the wall, a second later the front end seesaws over the top, the sudd angle change exposes for an instant the bottom of Bourne' car, to the shooters. Several rounds rip through the floorboard and tear past Bourne's head just before his car drops upside down for 2 feet and slams onto a row of parked cars. The impact rips Bourne from the seat and slams him hard against the roof. Bourne struggles out of the car, knowing he has only a moment before the armed agents will fire down into his ov turned car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ho-ly shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (practically screaming into his handheld)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He did what?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CRI agents race to the spot where Bourne's car disappeared over the railing and reflexively fire into Bourne's car but they're too late! Bourne's already out. He disappears from sight under the covered parking structure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get down there! Get down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it speeds toward the spaghetti of ramps leading in and out of Port Authority -- two blocks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who has eyeball on him?! Who has eyeball?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the agents scrambles over the edge and starts to climb down. Other agents race for the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tell me--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --you've lost him! Who's on street level?! Street level backup?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clearly there is no one down there. Bourne's car jump fro the roof has completely flat-footed them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Wills) Get NYPD backup! And FBI, DEA, any other federal assets we can draft!

dialogues.speaker: 274A INT/EXT. CIRCULAR RAMP
dialogues.text: Two CRI cars race down from the roof to try to get to the level Bourne's on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne cuts off a guy cruising for a parking space and pulls him from his car and races away as the agent from t roof lands hard behind him. Bourne's race to the exit is cut off as a 3rd CRI sedan slides into view and it's occupants open fire on Bourne i a head on charge. The just stolen vehicle takes heavy fire as Bourne reacts instantaneously; thumbing on the cruise control, shouldering his door open, and slamming the gas pedal to the floor as he dives out of the car. The agents react as Bourne's sedan torpedoes them head on Hit hard they're taken out of the fight as metal collapse glass shatters, and airbags explode. Bourne tumbles to a stop at the rear of a parked car as h car implodes against the oncoming agents. Instantly Bourne is on his feet, moving between the parke cars to engage another CRI sedan traveling parallel to th course of the wrecked one. The agents in this sedan are distracted by the still echoing crash and are caught off-guard as Bourne steps ou and points his gun at the driver. The driver ducks and floors his gas pedal in a desperate effort to save his own life. As the sedan suddenly accelerates, Bourne deliberately shifts his aim to the sedan's front tire and fires. The tire explodes and the car suddenly veers left and sla into a parked car, pitching the driver violently against the unyielding interior of the sedan. An instant later Bourne rips the radio off the dazed drivers belt just before he cold cocks him with it. With the wreck still echoing through the garage Bourne ha to deal with the arrival of the first NYPD sedan. Bourne takes on the persona of an alarmed witness as the edge cop climbs out of his car but Bourne's performance i cut short as the agent running from his drop from the roo arrives and opens fire. The police officer goes down in the hail of gunfire as Bourne turns and expertly drops the gunman with a single shot. The increasing volume of squealing tires alerts Bourne to new threat, he pulls the officer into some cover and grab the officer's radio. BOURNE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 10-13. Shots fired. Officer down. Port Authority parking lot. Level four. Bourne rips a piece of his sweater off and ties a makeshi tourniquet for the officer.   Then he hands the cop his radio back. BOURNE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay out of sight until one of your own arrive. Bourne disappears. We pick him up as he jumps into the cops car and guns the engine and heads for the exits. CRI agents are confused for a second -- until they pick u the NYPD car exiting Port Authority on one of the ramps. But that's all the time Bourne needs--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne turns on his lights and siren and speeds east, followed closely by a CRI sedan. As cars yield to Bourne's siren a taxi tries to jump into Bourne's wake but a CRI sedan punches the taxi back to th right. It ricochets off several parked cars before regaining control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne struggles to keep his over-matched vehicle ahead o the more powerful CRI Sedan which tries to spin Bourne ou by hitting his bumper. Bourne tacks right quickly and barely avoids a stopped ca The CRI sedan flanking Bourne's slams into the rear of th car, spinning it 180 degrees into the path of the trailin CRI sedan which destroys itself in the resulting collisio and blocks the path of the other CRI sedan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne is home free. He looks around and spots a sign tha indicates a right turn and says "To Holland Tunnel / US 95." Bourne turns right-- Suddenly the window next to his head explodes as two more shots rip through his door to tear a jagged wound into th top of Bourne's leg. REVEAL Paz, his SUV racing along the curb lane. As Bourne's car crosses in front of a small car stopped at t intersection Paz swerves his car into that car and punche it into the side of Bourne's car. Bourne's car is knocked spinning, Paz keeps charging forward and slams into the back of Bourne's car. With his front tires spinning wildly Bourne fights to straighten h car as another CRI sedan appears and tries to box Bourne' car by sliding into his path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne just manages to punch his car into the right rear the CRI Sedan and race down the Avenue with Paz and the slightly damaged sedan in pursuit. Paz gains on him and Bourne is forced to swerve violently to deny Paz the kill shot he is all too capable of. Just ahead of Bourne, two government SUVs slide into the intersection completely blocking his path. Bourne instantly spins his car 180 degrees and continues on, barreling into the roadblock backwards. As Bourne's car plows through the SUV's he whips the whee and his car spins through a reverse 180 as Paz and the other sedan race through the wreckage in Bourne's wake. Paz and the CRI sedan are all over Bourne as he slides a right hand turn onto South St. as Paz and the CRI sedan overwhelm Bourne's battered vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On his police radio, Bourne singles out an NYPD officer (call sign Alpha-2503) racing toward the intersection jus ahead. Bourne slows, then speeds up quickly to time it right: The CRI car almost hits his bumper, then has to accelerat through the upcoming intersection. As he does, the cop ca Bourne was listening to on the radio slams broadside into the CRI sedan drafting the bumper of the mangled cop car. Swerving wildly Paz avoids the pileup and slams his heavy SUV into the back of Bourne's car, pushing him into the oncoming traffic. Several cars swerve left and right as Paz pushes Bourne sideways onto the ramped end of a K-Rail dividing the street ahead. The nearly upended car grinds down the K-Rail until the rear of Bourne's car strikes an obstruction which punches it back into the lane as it slams against the front of Paz's SUV, knocking the SUV sideways, into a row of parke cars. Bourne's car hits parked cars on the other side of the road. SMOKE and STEAM -- SIRENS -- CHAOS BOURNE kicks the window out of the police car.   Gun up.. Ready--

dialogues.speaker: NEARBY
dialogues.text: 287A    PAZ in the car. Still. Bloody from the crash, rea fucked up. He comes to...and Bourne is there. Gun pointed at his head... The two assassins look at each other...then Bourne lowers his gun...and disappears... ON PAZ -- as the wheels start to turn...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The asset lost Bourne.   We lost him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen reacts--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne exits from the subway.   Bourne walks north.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills pacing... Bourne's profile is up on Screen 2. It says "David Webb (AKA Jason Bourne)" on the profile.  A tech comes to Wills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, this may be nothing but, look at Bourne's birthday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills looks at the profile.   Bourne's birthdate is liste as 9/13/70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Landy told Bourne his birthday was 4/15/71 so...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills gets it instantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything stops. (to the room now) EVERYTHING STOPS! LISTEN UP! (they're listening) New assignment. Numbers. Four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WILLS (cont'd) Fifteen. Seventy-one. What do they mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills grabs his headset--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CRI agent approaches Vosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy gave Bourne a false birthday. Wills thinks it's a code.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sinks in for Vosen...oh...shit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOURNE emerges into the crowed street, headed uptown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wills watches the techs work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- if you plug them in as variants of latitude and longitude you get Cameroon -- Peru -- Colombia --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- San Francisco's got a four-one- five area code --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- 41571 is the zip code for Varney, Kentucky --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- there's no 415 West 71st Street, but there is a 415 East 71st --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- if it's a substitution code, we're way short on variables, which I -- (no chance to finish as-- )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --hang on -- wait -- Seventy First Street? Like what? Like York and First?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's correct. Wills like he's been hit.   Like hard.   As we cut to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They race uptown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gave him the facility.     She gave him--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into cell phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. (to driver)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! Go! Drive! (into cell phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're already on our way. Turn the teams around. Bring them in behind me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen steely eyed as they race uptown.    He dials a numb

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne reaches 71st street and 2nd Ave.    He looks up at sign...

dialogues.speaker: AFTERNOON
dialogues.text: Hirsch's office is located in the SRD's "front office", which is located covertly on a floor of the new building the hospital. He is the longtime head of SRD and a powerful behind-the-scenes official at CIA.

dialogues.speaker: THE CAMERA FINDS
dialogues.text: DR. HIRSCH, 70, is, put simply, not a man to be trifled with. He's a 45 year CIA veteran. One of the great brains in the Agency's history, but also a man who knows how to wield power silently, invisibly, and to tremendous effect His phone buzzes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VOSEN at the other end of the line --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne knows everything. I think he's heading for you right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's coming home, Noah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a wistfulness in the way he says it. But also the sense that this was absolutely inevitable. And he's calm about it, doesn't show any fear, doesn't reach for a gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long do I have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not long.    Get out of there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.   I'm going to stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you crazy, he'll--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll come to the training wing. That's what he knows. I'll keep him in play until you arrive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne arrives at the "Johnston Medical Center."   He loo up to see "415".

dialogues.speaker: FB5 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: The image of "415" that has been haunting his dreams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the place... When he looks down Landy steps out o the lobby to meet him on the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll kill you for giving me this place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4/15/71 isn't much of a code. My guess is Vosen's already on his way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you do it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't us, David. What they turned you into, what they're doing with Blackbriar... This has to stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then stop it. Everything you need is in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne hands her the black bag and enters the hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David... Come in with me. It's better if we do this together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes head) This is where it started for me, this is where it ends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She watches the doors close behind him....     Landy lets go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUICK SHOTS of six different CRI sedans and SUVs rushing toward the hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy looks in the backpack.

dialogues.speaker: JUMPCUTS
dialogues.text: --She unzips the backpack and looks in at the the Blackbriar Operations File. --A cover page inside: "utmost secrecy"... "potentially explosive public reaction would jeopardize the program".. --Another page: "Terminated" stamped across the photos of victims. Next to the victim from the inciting incident, the words: "US citizen"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my God... --A third page, more photos, no "terminated" on these. Future victims. "US citizen" stamped next to each one...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne uses the card reader he took from Vosen's safe to enter a "restricted access elevator."   A guard comes. Bourne aims his pistol at him as the elevator door closes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy walks down the street. She looks up to spot two black sedans speeding east on 71st, turns south -- two SU coming up York.   Shit--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A block south of the hospital, stuck in traffic, Vosen points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy! Right there!    She's got Bourne's backpack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne flips up the elevator stop button and uses the access card to enter a secure corridor--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy runs across the lobby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen's SUV careens to a stop behind a bunch of traffic. Still a half block from the entry door but it's close enough--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne rushes down a nondescript corridor--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen and CRI agents rush into the lobby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to a group of six agents) I'll find Landy. You get to the training wing and get Bourne!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A security guard comes over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know who I am? (the guard nods) Where's your security room?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landy looks around. Finds an open office. She pushes open the door and runs to the fax machine. She starts faxing the Blackbriar documents Bourne took from Vosen's safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to see all your footage for the last three minutes.

dialogues.speaker: AFTERNOON
dialogues.text: Bourne stares down the corridor from his dreams, the corridor Daniels lead him down in his flashback. We see Bourne go into--

dialogues.speaker: FBA3 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: That first day, Bourne's POV being led down this corridor by Daniels.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Bourne moves down the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: AFTERNOON
dialogues.text: Bourne reaches the end of the hall.       He looks around "flashback style" --

dialogues.speaker: FBB3 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne was standing at this door....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vosen enters the room.    The last pages have been faxed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You better get a good lawyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She exits...

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Then spins, gun up-- Hirsch is there, halfway down the corridor behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the gun down. I wouldn't be here if I didn't want to talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've spent three years running. Three years trying to find out who I was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hirsch moves toward Bourne, completely unfazed by the gun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still don't have it all back, do you? You haven't filled in all the pieces?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's start with the moment you found out I wouldn't execute Wombosi. The amnesia wasn't the issue, it was the fact that I didn't pull the trigger....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One lapse meant your conditioning had failed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne grabs Hirsch and slams him against the wall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was always you, behind Conklin, behind Abbott.... They were just following orders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne grabs Hirsch and pushes him to the wall.   Searche him for weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (completely calm) I'm unarmed, Jason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shoving Hirsch hard against the wall) "David." I'm David Webb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON Bourne's face--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were David Webb, but not anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne stands with Hirsch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why me?   Why did you pick me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really don't remember, do you? (beat) You picked us, Jason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You volunteered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hirsch uses his free hand to hit the keypad on the wall. The "room in use" sign lights up. Bourne looks up "flashback style"--

dialogues.speaker: FBA1 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne remembers that keypad, that "room in use" sign fro the first day...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne and Hirsch enter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You volunteered right here.... You didn't even blink, Jason. You just handed me these...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hirsch removes a pair of dog tags from his jacket pocket. Holds them out to Bourne. Bourne takes the dog tags.        Stares at them. INSERT of the dog tags: Webb, David 946610190 O Negative Catholic

dialogues.speaker: FB9 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne hands over his dog tags....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has everything been explained to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were a soldier ready to serve his country. Just like thousands of others, except you were a prodigy with languages...and a perfect shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your missions will save American lives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said I'd be saving American lives. Instead you just turned me into a killer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne raises the gun to Hirsch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could have left at any time. And you knew exactly what it meant for you if you chose to stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we're finished with you, you'll no longer be David Webb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be whoever you need me to be, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop running from the truth, Jason. You chose to come here! You chose to stay! And no matter how much you want to forget it...eventually you're going to have to face how you chose, right there, to become Jason Bourne!

dialogues.speaker: FB10 FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Bourne sitting in a chair, looking terrible.     Hirsch l at him from behind the desk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You haven't slept for a long time have you David? Have you made a decision? This can't go on, you know. You have to decide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've been through that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did he do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter. (beat) You came to us. You volunteered. You said you'd do anything it takes to save American lives. You're not a liar are you? Or too weak to see this through? This is it. Let go of David Webb. Will you give yourself to this program?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne looks down, a gun in his hand. He gets to his feet swiftly and fires the pistol several times into a hooded figure. The man slumps over. Bourne stares at what he's done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're no longer David Webb. From now on you'll be known as Jason Bourne. Welcome to the program. Daniels pulls the hood off the figure to show that he is dead. Just then Kramer walks through the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's ready. Send him to Operations.

dialogues.speaker: PRESENT
dialogues.text: And now, in real time, Bourne comes out of the flashback. He stares back at Hirsch....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you remember now? Bourne lowers the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I remember. I remember everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't outrun what you did, Jason. You made yourself into who you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm done running.  That's why I'm here. To end you, to shut this down. I'm no longer Jason Bourne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So now you're going to kill me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You don't deserve the star they give you on the wall at Langley. Just then Bourne spins -- agents arrive at the door.    I locked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The agents fire at the door handle to get it open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne looks out a window.   Sees the layout of a roof several stories below. Then he turns and shoots out the room's mirrored observation window. Bourne dives through it just as agents rush in and open fire at him.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: Bourne races through corridors, loosing the CRI agents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne runs out onto the roof. Rushes across it to look over the edge.   It's a straight drop to the FDR -- 12 stories down. He races to another ledge -- the East River below him. Bu he has to clear a 10 foot supporting wall at the base of the building to hit the water.   He backs up to get a running leap. As he does, he turns and sees Paz, who is holding a gun o him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you take the shot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you even know why you're trying to kill me? Look at what they make you give.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne turns and runs off the roof. Paz fires into the air... FOLLOW Bourne as he drops fourteen stories into the freezing river-- MULTIPLE ANGLES -- Bourne goes into the river...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne in a dead man's float...as his clothes soak throug he begins to sink.... PULL BACK...farther and farther from Bourne's dead still sinking....as OVERLAPPING, INTERWEAVING VOICE OVERS begin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FBI agents arrested several senior CIA officials today in connection with the broadening scandal enveloping Washington today--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Assassination program code-named "Blackbriar" was exposed by a former assassin named David Webb-- -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Program reportedly targeting US Citizens in some cases...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CIA Director Ezra Kramer produced explosive documents for the Senate Committee indicating "Blackbriar" was authorized at the highest levels of government.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky goes to the bar of at a low end tourist bar with several other customers.   She stands there, eyes fixed o a TV behind the bar:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Webb, who was known inside the intelligence community, as "Jason Bourne" jumped from the fourteenth floor of the CIA facility where he was trained in New York into the East River below.   While experts say it would be nearly impossible to survive the fall, despite two weeks of efforts, his body has still not been recovered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH in on the smile that develops on Nicky's face.   As CUE the Moby "Extreme Ways" sting---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bourne's body sinking toward the bottom...when all of a sudden it comes to life -- arms together, legs kick powerfully-- And Bourne swims away... 104
